name: Skim
text: This spell allows you to read written material in a quarter of the time it would normally take to read it. If you use this spell in conjunction with comprehend languages, you can read otherwise incomprehensible text four times faster than the spell indicates. If the text is fragmented, is particularly difficult to understand, or otherwise requires an ability check or skill check (such as a Linguistics check) to read quickly or at all, this spell doesn’t directly increase your reading speed, but instead grants you a +8 bonus on the check. This bonus also applies to Research checks when you research a particular topic within a library (Pathfinder RPG Ultimate Intrigue 148).
components_zh: 语言，姿势，材料/法器（一张折起的书页1）
text_zh: 此法术使你在阅读书面资料时，所需花费的时间降为原本的四分之一。如果你将此法术与通晓语言法术结合，那么在阅读原本不能理解的文本时，你能够用该法术所述速度的四倍进行阅读。如果文本支离破碎、特别难以理解，或因为其他某些原因而需要进行属性检定或技能检定（例如语言学检定）才能够快速或详尽地阅读，那么本法术不能够直接提升你的阅读速度，但是你会在该检定上获得+8加值。当你在图书馆中搜索特定主题的资料时（见探索者角色扮演游戏《极限诡道》148页），同样获得此加值。
